snippet.title: Official Trailer - Destined to Love: Ikémen Samurai Romances (Otome Game)
snippet.description:
Travel back in time to meet your one true love in Destined to Love, an Otome Game for iOS and Android made by the same team behind the hit game Midnight Cinderella, downloaded by 3 million women around the world!

Learn more about the game here:
https://www.cyikemen.com/DestinedToLove/

【 Story 】
You've traveled back in time to 19th century Kyoto!
With no way home, you find yourself falling for one of 13 hot heroes.
Caught in the center of revolution, which side will you choose? 
Your romance awaits you in the past. Do you believe in destiny?

Get the latest updates on our Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/CyIkemenSeries
